alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 2:10PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Eureka County through 245 PM PDT... At 209 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles northeast of Grass Valley to 9 miles northwest of Garden Pass. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of central Eureka County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
